page.title: 07SCHOOLS IN BRADWELL
page.content:
The size of Bradwell has incresed during the last 25 years. In that time three new schools have been built. One teacher at our school has taught at all these schools. He came to teach in Bradwell in 1963. The first school he taught at was{Homefield V.C. Primary. This school was opened in 1961 and was built to replace the original village school.Even after the new school was built it was necessary to use the old building as an annexe. The old school is still used as the Community Centre.
